alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 16 at 10:57AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER NEAR KALSKAG... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...The Kuskokwim River near Kalskag. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is ongoing in Kalskag, with water over the road to the airport and water over the road at the school. Other low lying areas may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 821 AM AKDT, The River Watch Team reports high water in Kalskag due to nearby ice jams along the Kuskokwim River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
